name: Music Lovers
description: Safe music lovers allows users to not only view music events/festivals for a desired city but also see real time COVID-19 data for the city as well. Users also have the ability to click on desired event and will be redirected to purchase tickets. We have also implemented a feature based on what the mortality rate is, a GIF is displayed to the user suggesting to either go to said event or to maybe sit it out.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This weather dashboard that allows the user to type a city and get the current weather conditions for the day as well as the 5 day forecast. The application adds the city to the search history. When the user clicks on cities saved in the history the weather for those cities is displayed.

name: Football or Futbol
description: Football or Futbol is an application designed for sports enthusiasts to compare and contrast a football player and a futbol player. Not only can they do that but they can also make the selected players go head to head in a VS game mode to obtain a winner via their stats.
